name: Evil Eye Repose
text: When you activate this card: You can banish 1 "Evil Eye" card from your GY; draw 1 card. Once per turn, after damage calculation, if your "Evil Eye" monster equipped with "Evil Eye of Selene" attacked an opponent's monster: You can banish that opponent's monster. If this card in the Spell & Trap Zone is destroyed by card effect: You can target up to 3 of your banished "Evil Eye" cards; return them to the GY. You can only activate 1 "Evil Eye Repose" per turn.
